Liquidery

What're you drinking about?

Liquidery will be usefull to note down what drinks you have tasted. Then, when you go buy to the supermakert and you´re not sure if you already tried that wine... POM! Liquery in your pocket to the rescue! Also if you want to try with a fancy dinner (again...) this time you will remember if that one works or not, just sayin'

  1. Take a pic of the label and enter the name

  2. Tell what kind of drink is it

    This -wine- is

    White
    Black
    Red
    Green

  3. What do you think about it

    Add your comments here, something that will be useful to know in the future about this -wine-

  4. So far you have drinked

Liquidery will be usefull to note down what drinks you have tasted. Then, when you go buy to the supermakert and you´re not sure if you already tried that wine... POM! Liquery in your pocket to the rescue! Also if you want to try with a fancy dinner (again...) this time you will remember if that one works or not, just sayin'
